name: Winter Huntsman Shooting
description:
Hunt started when deadly Wolves and Bears went wild in Eastern States.

You are a Huntsman, hired to infiltrate secure locations and eliminate deadly animals.

- EASY CONTROLS (Tap to shoot)
- ULTRA Realistic Graphics
- Beautiful Snow falling winter Landscapes
- Multiple TARGETS and Scenarios!
- Multiple missions

Winter huntsman provides you a chance to have an exciting sniper shooting experience.
Are you ready become Professional Winter Huntsman?
